name: fibonacci_nth_term
description: Create a Scratch program that takes a positive integer N as input and outputs the Nth number in the Fibonacci sequence (1, 1, 2, 3, 5...). The sprite should say the result.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that takes a positive integer N as input and outputs the Nth number in the Fibonacci sequence (1, 1, 2, 3, 5...). The sprite should say the result.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: fibonacci_nth_term
